definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: impf. extend, hold out (late) (NH Hiph. id.; Aram. Aph. [[אוֹשֵׁיט]], 0aw4et. id.; ? As. asûṭu, extended, mighty  Lyon:Sargontexte 60 Dl:HWB 144; Ar. wasat.a is penetrate into the middle of)—[[יוֹשִׁיט שַׁרְבִיט הַזׇּהָב לְ]] Es 4:11hold out the golden sceptre to , so ([[וֵי֫וֹשֶׁט]]) Es 5:2, Es 8:4.
